flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction: After this in stead of having a boring normal light switch you will have a SUPER HIGH POWER PI LIGHTS.
guide.introduction_rendered: After this in stead of having a boring normal light switch you will have a SUPER HIGH POWER PI LIGHTS.
guide.summary: This project enables you to control your room or house lights from a raspberry pi
guide.title: Raspberry Pi Room Automation
